Narwapahar Mine is located 11 km SE of Jamshedpur, Jharkhand, India. Web search geocoded. Source: Calculated from Jaduguda (https://environmentclearance.nic.in/writereaddata/Online/TOR/09_Oct_2017_193044543TEYA70Q8PFR_NarwapaharMine.pdf). Narwapahar Mine is known to be the most modern uranium mine in India, commissioned in April 1995
